January 1979: Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy

Plays:

Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy (菅原伝授手習鑑)

Scenes:

The Imperial Palace (大内)

The Kamo River Bank (加茂堤)

The Handing on the Secrets of Calligraphy (筆法伝授)

At the Fence (築地)

The Beating of Kariya (杖折檻)

The Cockcrow (東天紅)

The Departure of Michizane (丞相名残)

The Quarrel Over the Carriage (車曳(車引吉田社頭))

Shiradayu's 70th Birthday Celebration (茶筅酒)

The Quarrel (喧嘩)

Sakuramaru's Suicide (桜丸切腹)

Mount Tempai (天拝山)

The Enrollment (寺入り)

The Village School (寺子屋)
